Headline: #49B North Western Temporary Southbound Reroute near Western/Leland
ShortDescription: Southbound 49B North Western  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Leland, Wilson and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Leland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #49B North Western  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Leland, Wilson and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Leland.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: Revision: 34 South Michigan buses are temp. rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford, 130th & Eberhart due to street blockage near 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford, 130th, Eberhart, then will resume their normal route due to street blockage near 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Springfield
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Laramie, 31st, Pulaski and 26th due to police activity near 26th/Springfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Laramie, 31st, Pulaski, then resume their normal route on 26th due to police activity near 26th/Springfield.

Allow extra travel time.
